hero.feature1.desc: Any scenario, any character, any story. Your imagination is the only limit.
hero.feature2.title: No Censorship
hero.feature2.desc: SFW, moderate, or NSFW — you choose the content rating. No filters.
hero.feature3.title: Smart & Fast
hero.feature3.desc: Multiple language models for the best quality and speed. Always improving.
hero.feature4.title: Create Your Own
hero.feature4.desc: Build characters from scratch or generate them from any text.

form.name: Character name *
form.personalityPlaceholder: Describe the personality, manner of speech, habits. Write in second person: 'You are...'
form.structuredTagsHint: Affect behavior — add instructions to the prompt
form.appearancePlaceholder: Describe the character's appearance: height, build, facial features, clothing, distinguishing marks...
form.scenarioPlaceholder: Description of the situation, world, and interaction context...
form.greetingPlaceholder: Character's first message when starting a chat. Use *asterisks* for action descriptions.
form.exampleDialoguesPlaceholder:
{{char}}: *adjusts violin* Good day. How may I help you?
{{user}}: Hello!

You can use {{char}} and {{user}} — they'll be replaced with names.
form.instructionsPlaceholder: Additional rules (will be added to system prompt)...
form.maxTokensHelp: Maximum response length. 1 token ≈ 3-4 characters. Default: 2048.
settings.title: Model & Settings
settings.temperatureTooltip:
Controls response randomness.

0.0 — strictly predictable text.
0.3–0.5 — restrained style, few surprises.
0.7 — balance between accuracy and creativity (default).
1.0+ — more creative, unpredictable responses.
2.0 — maximum randomness, text may become incoherent.

Default: 0.7
settings.topPTooltip:
Limits word selection by cumulative probability (nucleus sampling).

The model considers only the most probable words until their cumulative probability reaches this threshold.

0.5 — only top 50% probable words.
0.9 — wider selection, more diverse text.
1.0 — all words available.

Works together with temperature. Usually changing one is enough.

Default: 0.95
settings.topKTooltip:
Limits word selection by count: the model only picks from K most probable options.

0 — disabled, all words available.
10 — only top 10 words, very predictable.
40–50 — good balance.
100 — almost no restrictions.

Default: 0 (disabled)
settings.frequencyPenaltyTooltip:
Reduces probability of repeating the same words within a single response.

0.0 — no penalty, model may repeat.
0.3–0.5 — light penalty, removes obsessive repeats.
1.0 — noticeable penalty, more diverse text.
2.0 — strong penalty (may hurt coherence).

Default: 0.3
settings.presencePenaltyTooltip:
Penalizes words and phrases that already appeared in the dialogue context. Helps avoid repeating the same descriptions from message to message.

0.0 — no penalty.
0.3 — light penalty, fewer cross-message repeats (recommended).
0.6 — noticeable penalty, more diverse responses.
1.0+ — strong penalty, model actively avoids previously mentioned topics.

Default: 0.3
settings.contextLimitTooltip:
How much conversation history the model sees.

4K — ~10-15 messages, fast responses.
8K — ~25-35 messages, good balance.
16K — ~50-70 messages, deep context.
∞ — no limit, all history (may hit model limits).

Older messages beyond the limit are "forgotten" by the model.

Default: ∞ (no limit)
settings.nsfwBlocked: This model doesn't support NSFW content
settings.cerebrasNoPenalty: Cerebras does not support frequency/presence penalty. These settings will be ignored.
settings.maxTokensTooltip:
Maximum response length. 1 token ≈ 3-4 characters.

256 — very short (~750 chars).
1024 — short (~3000 chars).
2048 — medium (~6000 chars).
4096 — long (~12000 chars).

Hard limit: response will be cut off if exceeded.

Default: 2048

featured.title: Character of the Day
about.title: About SweetSin
about.p1: SweetSin is a platform for creative roleplay and character-driven conversations. We connect language models with imaginative character profiles to create immersive chat experiences.
about.p2: Our platform supports multiple providers, giving you the freedom to choose the best model for your conversations. Whether you prefer speed, creativity, or depth — we have options for every style.
about.p3: Create your own characters, explore community creations, and dive into stories without limits or judgment.
about.teamDesc: We believe in the power of creative expression and storytelling. SweetSin provides a safe space for adults to explore their imagination through character-driven conversations.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using SweetSin, you agree to the following terms:
terms.section1: You must be at least 18 years old to use this service. By creating an account, you confirm that you meet this requirement.
terms.section2: You are responsible for the characters you create and the content you generate. Do not create content that promotes real-world harm, involves real persons without consent, or violates applicable laws.
terms.section3: You agree not to abuse the platform, attempt to reverse-engineer the service, or use automated tools to scrape content. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.
terms.section4: SweetSin is provided as-is. We do not guarantee uninterrupted service or specific model availability. Generated content may contain inaccuracies.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy matters to us. Here is how we handle your data:
privacy.section1: We collect your email, username, and chat history to provide the service. We do not sell your data to third parties.
privacy.section2: Your data is used solely to operate the service: account management, chat delivery, and service improvement. Chat content is sent to providers for response generation.
privacy.section3: We use industry-standard encryption and secure hosting. Passwords are hashed and never stored in plain text.
privacy.section4: You can delete your account at any time from your profile page. This permanently removes all your data, characters, and chat history.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! Core features are free. We offer multiple free providers. Some premium models may require additional credits in the future.
faq.a2: We support OpenRouter, Groq, Cerebras, Together, DeepSeek, and direct API access to Claude, GPT-4o, and Gemini. Availability may vary.
faq.a3: Yes, for users 18+. You can set content ratings (SFW, Moderate, NSFW) per character. Some models may have content restrictions.
faq.q4: How do I create a character?
faq.a4: Click 'Create' in the header. You can build a character manually or paste any text and let it generate a character profile from it.
faq.a5: Yes. Your conversations are private and only visible to you. We do not share chat content with other users.
faq.a6: Yes. Go to Profile and use the 'Delete Account' option in the Danger Zone section. This permanently removes everything.
